DOC.brief_summary: This randomize , open-label study evaluate effect single dose SSP-004184 pharmacokinetics single dose simvastatin healthy adult subject .
DOC.brief_title: Effect SSP-004184 ( SPD602 ) Pharmacokinetics Simvastatin Healthy Adult Subjects
DOC.criteria: Normal healthy male female volunteer Serum ferritin , hemoglobin erythrocyte index within normal range Evidence active chronic disease
